projects.title: My GitHub Page
projects.description: This very website. I have built it as a multi-page static application to emphasize user experience through a well defined structure. Besides that, Eleventy (a Static Site Generator, SSG for short) provides very performant builds and great SEO optimization. This was also an opportunity to display my skills with the bare bones of the frontend skillset, since it uses no third-party UI component library, every component written by myself
